Articles.Content:
Even though I can have unlimited contracts the game still reduces the number of available contracts that I can accept as I accept them. Is there a mod to make it stop doing that and maybe offer more at one time?

(I'm not talking about new types of contracts, just the number that it lets me look though to accept or reject.)

This is easy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

If you go into your GameData folder then /Squad/Contracts/ there will be a contracts.cfg - One of the very first options will be how many contracts you are offered (Default 10) I bumped that up to 25 myself.
If you go into your Gamedata folder, inside of /Squad/Contracts/ will be contracts.cfg - Near the top of that file will be the entry for how many you are offered (default 10)

Will upping that number increase the number of a contract type that is offered? IE: I have only ever see it give me 2 "put a prob in kerbin orbit" contacts at a time. Is this how I can get it to offer me more at once?
